A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A terrible film\,I deeply regret having seen it. The Story\, the characters just horrible\, let alone the End of Luke Skywalker. For me this is definitely the end of the Star Wars saga. I own and read over 60 books and over 70 comics\, I used to love this universe\, but now I can only regret that Disney is allowed to destroy this universe by making such horrible movies. In conclusion I can not recommend this film\, certainly not to a fan and neither to viewer interested in well developed films.
